name: Gilbert Asumwisye
message: The course was refreshing, interactive and interesting; a good mixture of a practical and theory with enough time to discuss issues.

name: Richard Ameh
message: The course was refreshing, interactive and interesting; a good mixture of a practical and theory with enough time to discuss issues.

name: Adeyemi Ameerah
message: It was an immense pleasure to test the skills acquired during this program, through the holistically conceived individual projects and also enjoyed working with fellow trainees on group project.

name: Sonna Maël
message: CWW has given me a good opportunity to start a career in tech. I learnt more than I thought I would. My facilitator did a great job in impacting knowledge into us and I’m glad to be beneficiary of CWW Cohort 1.0.
